Name: Blood Bound Band
HPText: Each brother has [HP] hp per player character [MIN]

SetupTraits.Name: Blood Brothers
SetupTraits.Description: To determine which brothers the Band consists of, roll a d10 4 times, reroll repeats, or pick 4.

Actions.Name: Blood Bond
Actions.Description: Swap places with a Blood Brother in range 3.

Actions.Name: Setup
Actions.Description: Dash 3, then gain stealth. Next action treats all targets as bloodied.

Actions.Name: Serrated Knife
Actions.Description: A character in range 4 takes [fray] damage. If they're bloodied, they take [fray] damage twice.

Actions.Name: First Blood
Effects: May dash 1 before and after attack.
Attack deals max damage to undamaged characters or characters with any amount of vigor.

Phases.Name: 2+ Brothers
Phases.Description: Each time a Blood Brother is defeated, all active brothers gain the Blood-bound Blessing of the fallen brother, empowering them. Each brother has a different blessing.

Phases.Name: 1 Brother
Phases.Description: If only one Brother is remaining, they become unstoppable and gain +1 action for the rest of combat.

Interrupts.Name: Dropkick
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe finishes taking an action in range 3 of Boots.
Interrupts.Effects: Boots teleports adjacent to that foe, then they take [D]+[fray] and are shoved 3. Foe must then save or be stunned.

Actions.Name: The Boot
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 2. If they're bloody, they are instead shoved 4.

Actions.Name: Garrote
Actions.Effects: An adjacent foe must save. On a successful save, that foe takes [fray] damage twice. On a failed save, that foe and Fixer become immobile. At the end of the targeted foe's turn, they must save or take damage equal to 50% of their max hp. Bloodied characters fail this save. Then, this effect ends. It also ends early if Fixer or the targeted foe are moved apart. Only one character can be garroted at once.

Actions.Name: Poison Gas
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters in the area take [D]+[fray]. Then, they must save or take [D] again, become poisoned, and become blinded. Poisoned or blinded characters fail this save.

Interrupts.Name: Feline Felicity
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe starts or ends their turn.
Interrupts.Effects: Teleport 3, then may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Fan of Nya-ives
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes take [fray] damage. Bloodied foes take [fray] damage three times.

Actions.Name: Aura of Skulduggery
Actions.Description: Until the start of their next turn, Sharkie gains Aura 2. Sharkie and other Brothers in the aura have evasion.

Actions.Name: Swindle
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 must save or swap places with Sharkie, teleporting. Bloodied characters fail the save.

Actions.Name: Nighthaunt
Actions.Description: Pale teleports 3, then becomes intangible and gains phasing until the start of their next turn. This action grants resistance instead if they are the only Brother active.

Combo.Name: Assassinate
Combo.Effects: Deals half damage if foe has any amount of vigor. Deals double damage if foe is bloodied.

Actions.Name: Ricochet Shot
Effects: A different foe in range 3 from the original target takes [D].
Deals bonus damage against bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Blood Pyre
Actions.Effects: Summon a pit under every bloodied character.

Actions.Name: Spark
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is marked.
Actions.Mark: At the end of the marked character's turn, if they are still marked, they explode in a blast 1 area effect for [D]+[fray]. Summon a pit under them. If that foe is already standing in a pit, they instead take damage equal to 50% of their max hp. Then clear this mark. It explodes immediately if used against bloodied foes.

Interrupts.Name: Sacrifice
Interrupts.Trigger: Another Brother would take damage in range 6.
Interrupts.Effects: This character takes damage equal to 25% of their HP. That ally gains vigor 1 before the damage is applied.

Actions.Name: Bounty Hunter
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the target cannot benefit from evasion, dodge, or stealth, and allies gain +1 boon to attack the foe. Using this mark again transfers it.

Actions.Name: Weaken
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is pacified.
